title: Grapefruit and avocado salad
ingredients: ['250g mixed salad greens', '20 stems fresh coriander', '1 grapefruit', '1 ripe avocado', '2 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil', '2 teaspoons balsamic vinegar', '1 pinch of sugar or tip of a teaspoon of honey', '1 pinch of salt', 'freshly ground black pepper']
